title: SEC Could Rewrite Fiduciary Rule, Accepting ESG Investing, Regulating the “Scooter Boom”
itunes:title: SEC Could Rewrite Fiduciary Rule, Accepting ESG Investing, Regulating the “Scooter Boom”
description:
Masters in Business Host Barry Ritholtz joins Carol and they speak to Ben Bain, Bloomberg News Financial Regulations Reporter, on the SEC looking to ease conflict of interest rules. Victoria L. Fernandez, Managing Director at Crossmark Global, explains why environmental, social and governance investing is growing. Jack McIntyre, Portfolio Manager at Brandywine Global, talks about making money in currencies. Joshua Brustein, Tech Writer for Bloomberg Businessweek, talks about U.S. cities looking to regulate motorized scooter companies. We Drive to the Close with Brad McMillan, CIO at Commonwealth Financial Network. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
